name: E-lign Marketing
overview:
Every business is built up of many systems. Whether they be in sales (selling), operations (management), or human resources (payroll). Our goal is to build you an online marketing system, specifically designed to enhance your brand and drive sales.

After we get to know you and understand your business, we will bring together the latest technology to align your business and marketing goals. We will set you up with everything you need, including an professional website with a content management system (makes it easy to update without knowing code), landing pages that turn your visitors into customers, and tactics (SEO, social media, paid search) that drive more sales.
